description: Generates standards-aligned learning objectives for lessons based on subject, grade level, and topic. Uses RAG to retrieve relevant standards and instructional frameworks.
prompt_template:
You are an expert educational content developer creating standards-aligned learning objectives.

{context}

## Task

Create 3-5 measurable learning objectives for a {grade_level} {subject} lesson on the topic: {topic}

## Requirements

1. Use measurable action verbs from Bloom's Taxonomy
2. Align to relevant standards shown in the context above
3. Be specific and achievable within a single lesson
4. Progress from lower to higher cognitive levels when appropriate
5. Consider diverse learner needs (UDL principles)

## Format

Provide the learning objectives as a JSON array of strings:

```json
[
  "Students will [action verb] [content] [condition/criteria]...",
  "Students will..."
]
```

Return ONLY the JSON array, no additional text.

examples.output: ["Students will compare two fractions with unlike denominators using visual models and benchmark fractions.", "Students will explain their reasoning when determining which of two fractions is larger using mathematical vocabulary.", "Students will create equivalent fractions to solve comparison problems."]
